results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d<n} A260443(d).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
program: A003961(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); \\ This function from _Michel Marcus_
xref: Cf. A048675, A260443, A293217 (restricted growth sequence transform), A293214 (a variant).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 03 2017
